title: What do modern Mayans look like? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm kind of the wrong person to ask because one of the other topics I write about is prosopagnosia (face blindness) because I can't recognize faces. So my skills at detecting differences in faces is suspect. Interestingly, when living among Mayans I didn't seem to suffer the “other race” effect. I learned to tell Mayans apart in the same amount of time using the same strategies as I do for CaucasIons But I digress. Some modern Mayans (or Maya) remind me very strongly of ancient depictions of Mayans. Some look more Latin or even Asian. Try googling “Maya Kiche” and looking at the images.
